topic.title: VPN
topic.body: Any recommendation about  a trustable VPN

1_1jUh3EtfZLmmqigyGvfPcDPEKPBW1awBE.body:
> [crustgod](#comment_2_1HiXfLxSzEVwGiQGjbFUweWuJXwRTHnRCn): Depends, what specifics are you looking for in a VPN?

Be protected when I'm on a insecure wireless, mostly for mail and some websites.
